supplierStockouts: Extract all instances where supplier stockouts caused delays. List the delay durations (in days) and provide a brief count of how many times this occurred. Answer in 2-3 sentences maximum.
inventoryShortages: Find all mentions of inventory shortages during picking. Count the occurrences and briefly mention any patterns or specific locations if mentioned. Answer in 1-2 sentences.
warehouseMislocations: List all warehouse mislocation incidents where stock was placed in wrong bins. Mention which warehouses (WH-X) had issues if specified, and provide a count. Keep it to 2 sentences.
packingErrors: Identify all wrong item shipments caused by SKU mapping errors in warehouse picklists. Provide a count and briefly mention the impact (customer escalations, etc.). Max 2 sentences.
qualityIssues: List all batches that failed quality checks and were returned to manufacturing. Include batch numbers if available and provide a total count. Keep response to 2 sentences.
customsHolds: Identify all shipments stuck at customs. Briefly mention the main reasons (missing documentation, etc.) and provide a count. Answer in 1-2 sentences.
overshipments: Find all over-shipment incidents. List the excess quantities mentioned (e.g., 20 units, 9 units) and provide a total count of incidents. Answer in 1-2 sentences.
supplierDocumentation: Identify all delays caused by missing supplier documentation. Mention which suppliers (Supplier-X) if specified and provide a count of incidents. Max 2 sentences.
